name: FunctionField.classNumber_eq_one_iff
initialProofState:
Fq : Type u_1
F : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : Field Fq
inst✝⁶ : Fintype Fq
inst✝⁵ : Field F
inst✝⁴ : Algebra (Polynomial Fq) F
inst✝³ : Algebra (RatFunc Fq) F
inst✝² : IsScalarTower (Polynomial Fq) (RatFunc Fq) F
inst✝¹ : FunctionField Fq F
inst✝ : Algebra.IsSeparable (RatFunc Fq) F
⊢ Iff (Eq (FunctionField.classNumber Fq F) 1) (IsPrincipalIdealRing (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (FunctionField.ringOfIntegers Fq F) x))
decl:
/-- The class number of a function field is `1` iff the ring of integers is a PID. -/
theorem classNumber_eq_one_iff :
    classNumber Fq F = 1 ↔ IsPrincipalIdealRing (ringOfIntegers Fq F) :=
  card_classGroup_eq_one_iff
